SELECT * FROM T_SGJ_PRDCT A, T_SGJ_PRDCT_DETAIL B, T_SGJ_CATEGORY C, T_SGJ_IMAGE D WHERE A.PRDCT_NO = B.PRDCT_NO AND B.PRDCT_CATEGORY_CD = C.CATEGORY_CD AND B.PRDCT_NO = D.PRDCT_NO AND B.PRDCT_DETAIL_NO = D.PRDCT_DETAIL_NO
AND B.PRDCT_CATEGORY_CD = #{categoryCd}

SELECT A.PRDCT_NO, B.PRDCT_DETAIL_NO, A.PRDCT_NM, B.PRDCT_SIZE, B.PRDCT_PRICE FROM T_SGJ_PRDCT A, T_SGJ_PRDCT_DETAIL B JOIN (SELECT B.PRDCT_NO, B.PRDCT_DETAIL_NO, COUNT(B.PRDCT_NO) AS "ORDER_CNT" FROM T_SGJ_ORDER A, T_SGJ_ORDER_ITEM B WHERE A.ORDER_NO = B.ORDER_NO GROUP BY B.PRDCT_NO, B.PRDCT_DETAIL_NO) C ON B.PRDCT_NO = C.PRDCT_NO AND B.PRDCT_DETAIL_NO = C.PRDCT_DETAIL_NO WHERE A.PRDCT_NO = B.PRDCT_NO ORDER BY C.ORDER_CNT DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT A.PRDCT_NO, B.PRDCT_DETAIL_NO, A.PRDCT_NM, B.PRDCT_SIZE, B.PRDCT_PRICE FROM T_SGJ_PRDCT A, T_SGJ_PRDCT_DETAIL B JOIN (SELECT B.PRDCT_NO, B.PRDCT_DETAIL_NO, COUNT(B.PRDCT_NO) AS "ORDER_CNT" FROM T_SGJ_ORDER A, T_SGJ_ORDER_ITEM B WHERE A.ORDER_NO = B.ORDER_NO GROUP BY B.PRDCT_NO, B.PRDCT_DETAIL_NO) C ON B.PRDCT_NO = C.PRDCT_NO AND B.PRDCT_DETAIL_NO = C.PRDCT_DETAIL_NO WHERE A.PRDCT_NO = B.PRDCT_NO ORDER BY C.ORDER_CNT DESC LIMIT 5
